Package ch.aplu.android.bluetooth

Addon package of the JDroidLib framework for Bluetooth communication.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BluetoothDiscoveryListener Declarations of the notification methods when a Bluetooth discovery is started.
BluetoothPeerListener Declarations of notification methods called from the class BluetoothPeer.
BluetoothServerListener Callback declaration when running a Bluetooth server.
 

Class Summary
BluetoothClient Class to create a client that connects to a server via Bluetooth.
BluetoothDiscovery Class for finding remote Bluetooth devices by an device discovery process.
BluetoothPeer Class that implements a Bluetooth peer-to-peer communication based on the client-server model.
BluetoothServer Class to create a client that connects to a server via Bluetooth.
 

Package ch.aplu.android.bluetooth Description

Addon package of the JDroidLib framework for Bluetooth communication.

Author: Aegidius Pluess, www.aplu.ch
Download: www.aplu.ch/jdroidlib
